info.description: The recommended REST API endpoints to be used when integrating with PatientView
info.title: PatientView

post.description: Authenticate using username and password, returns token, which must be added to X-Auth-Token in header of all future requests

get.description: Once logged in and have a token, get basic user information including group role membership
Given a User ID, get basic patient information for a user from clinical data stored in FHIR
Given a User ID retrieve a list of available observation types for that user (where they have observation data).
get.summary: Get Available Observations Types For a User

get.description: Given a User ID and search parameters, retrieve a page of observations.
get.summary: Get Observations of Multiple Types For a User

get.description: Given a User ID and observation code, retrieve all observations.
get.summary: Get Observations of a Certain Type For a User

get.description: Given a User ID and observation code, retrieve patient entered observations.
get.summary: Get patient entered Observations of a Certain Type For a User

get.description: Given a User ID retrieve a list of available observation types for that user (where they have patient entered observation data).
get.summary: Get Available Patient Entered Observations Types For a User
